name: Super Mario Bros. 8
overview:
This Hack is a request from Super Buni. Enjoy it! The main concept? To remake Super Bros. 8, a Chinese bootleg that used the excellent Don Doko Don 2 (1992, Taito) as a base.

Because the changes made by the Chinese in the game are poorly implemented, it has been chosen to redo all the work from scratch. Here are some of the changes:

● New Intro and title screen

● New text font ripped from Super Mario Bros. 3.

● Using as a base the excellent English translation of Don Doko Don 2 by MrRichard999 and Guyver, the cinematics are partially redrawn and the script is adapted to go along with the Hack theme.

● Main sprite and 90% of the enemies have been replaced or modified

● Minor changes to the backgrounds

● By popular demand and thinking that most people who are nostalgic for this cartridge are Spanish-speaking, it also includes a Spanish translation.

● Some funny cameos and Easter Eggs have been added.

And much more! Just take a look at the Readme file, or play the game and enjoy it!
